definition: allowing communication in only one direction at a time, or in telegraphy allowing only one message over a line at a time
details:
adjective
- allowing communication in only one direction at a time, or in telegraphy allowing only one message over a line at a time
= example: allowing communication in only one direction at a time, or in telegraphy allowing only one message over a line at a time
- having only one part or element
= example: having only one part or element
